title: Repo sync
author: docs-bot
details: Added GPT-5 model support across Copilot documentation (chat, comparison, hosting, and client compatibility)
Replaced static model multipliers table with reusable include for consistency
Fixed Visual Studio proxy authentication instructions formatting
Enhanced custom instructions documentation with repository-wide and path-specific examples
Added link to custom security configuration article
Updated pre-release license terms to include "private preview"
Added 7 new secret scanning patterns and updated validity checks for existing patterns
Improved frontmatter validation to ignore liquid variables in character counts

original_description:
This is an automated pull request to sync changes between the public and private repos.
Our bot will merge this pull request automatically.
To preserve continuity across repos, _do not squash_ this pull request.
raw_analysis:

- Added GPT-5 model support across Copilot documentation (chat, comparison, hosting, and client compatibility)
